heading: HR00755
0: RESOLUTION FOR THE COMMITTEE ON INFORMATION AND COMMUNICATIONS TECHNOLOGY TO INVESTIGATE AND EXPLORE, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, THE NECESSARY GOVERNMENT SUPPORT FOR THE BUSINESS PROCESS OUTSOURCING (BPO) INDUSTRY IN ORDER TO EXPAND AND MAXIMIZE THE SECTOR'S PARTICIPATION IN THE INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY ROADMAP OF THE PHILIPPINES INCLUDING THE PROPER DISPOSITION AND TRANSFER OF OLD IT EQUIPMENT
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00755
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION FOR THE COMMITTEE ON INFORMATION AND COMMUNICATIONS TECHNOLOGY TO INVESTIGATE AND EXPLORE, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, THE NECESSARY GOVERNMENT SUPPORT FOR THE BUSINESS PROCESS OUTSOURCING (BPO) INDUSTRY IN ORDER TO EXPAND AND MAXIMIZE THE SECTOR'S PARTICIPATION IN THE INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY ROADMAP OF THE PHILIPPINES INCLUDING THE PROPER DISPOSITION AND TRANSFER OF OLD IT EQUIPMENT
